description: This file defines an asynchronous function to generate an image using a Gemini model agent, and displays the resulting images.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class used to interact with the Gemini model for image generation.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class representing the Gemini Google model with specific response modalities.

methods.name: generate_image
methods.description: Asynchronous function that prompts the agent to generate an image of a cat in a tree and displays the images.
